title: Term structure modelling with overnight rates beyond stochastic continuity. (arXiv:2202.00929v4 [q-fin.MF] UPDATED)
abstract: Overnight rates, such as the SOFR (Secured Overnight Financing Rate) in the US, are central to the current reform of interest rate benchmarks. A striking feature of overnight rates is the presence of jumps and spikes occurring at predetermined dates due to monetary policy interventions and liquidity constraints. This corresponds to stochastic discontinuities (i.e., discontinuities occurring at ex-ante known points in time) in their dynamics. In this work, we propose a term structure modelling framework based on overnight rates and characterize absence of arbitrage in a generalised Heath-Jarrow-Morton (HJM) setting. We extend the classical short-rate approach to accommodate stochastic discontinuities, developing a tractable setup driven by affine semimartingales. In this context, we show that simple specifications allow to capture stylized facts of the jump behavior of overnight rates. translated_title: 超过随机连续性的隔夜利率的期限结构建模
translated_abstract: 隔夜利率（如美国的SOFR）是当前利率基准改革的核心。隔夜利率的一个显著特征是在预定日期发生跳跃和尖峰，这是由于货币政策干预和流动性限制导致的。这对应于在动态中出现随机不连续性（即在事先已知的时间点出现不连续）。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个基于隔夜利率的期限结构建模框架，并在广义的Heath-Jarrow-Morton（HJM）设置中表征无套利条件。我们拓展了传统的短期利率方法以适应随机不连续性，通过仿射半鞘马丁格尔进行可行的建模。在这个背景下，我们证明简单的规格可以捕捉到隔夜利率跃变行为的特征。在一个高斯设定下，我们提供了债券和帽式期权的显式估值公式。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种基于隔夜利率的期限结构建模框架，并成功捕捉到隔夜利率跳跃行为的特征。通过扩展传统短期利率方法来适应随机不连续性，我们提供了在高斯设定下的债券和帽式期权的显式估值公式。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a term structure modelling framework based on overnight rates and successfully captures the jump behavior of overnight rates. By extending the classical short-rate approach to accommodate stochastic discontinuities, explicit valuation formulas for bonds and caplets are provided in a Gaussian setting.
